A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Man I really wanted to like this movie. I even tried to convince myself my initial disappointment leaving the theater was unwarranted after a couple of days. Unfortunately there is simply no excuse for what they did to Luke\, the entire middle part of the film\, or the new “protagonist” Rose who has the personality of a wet log. Please someone take this series away from Rian - he means well but is completely incompetent.
